languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Опоздали! Опоздали!{/d}" {n}Абеляр сокрушенно всплескивает руками.{/n} "Либо Эдельтрад и его люди вообще не добрались сюда — что еще хуже!"

traits.locale_text: "Опоздали! Опоздали!" {n}Абеляр сокрушенно всплескивает руками.{/n} "Либо Эдельтрад и его люди вообще не добрались сюда — что еще хуже!"

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late! We are too late!{/d}" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Опоздали! Опоздали!{/d}" {n}Абеляр сокрушенно всплескивает руками.{/n} "Либо Эдельтрад и его люди вообще не добрались сюда — что еще хуже!"

traits.locale_text: "Too late! We are too late!" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"
"Too late! We are too late!" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"
"Too late! We are too late!" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"
"Too late! We are too late!" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"
"Too late! We are too late!" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

languages.text: “{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}太迟了！我们来得太迟了！{/d}”{n}阿贝拉德绝望地举起了双手。{/n}“也可能是艾德萨德与他的护卫根本没能赶到这里，那就更糟糕了！”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late! We are too late!{/d}" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

traits.locale_text: “太迟了！我们来得太迟了！”{n}阿贝拉德绝望地举起了双手。{/n}“也可能是艾德萨德与他的护卫根本没能赶到这里，那就更糟糕了！”

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}¡Demasiado tarde! ¡Es demasiado tarde!{/d}». {n}Abelard alza los brazos al techo, desesperado.{/n} «O puede que Edelthrad y su escolta jamás llegaran hasta aquí... ¡lo que sería aún peor!».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late! We are too late!{/d}" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Demasiado tarde! ¡Es demasiado tarde!». {n}Abelard alza los brazos al techo, desesperado.{/n} «O puede que Edelthrad y su escolta jamás llegaran hasta aquí... ¡lo que sería aún peor!».

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}手遅れだった！遅すぎた！{/d}」{n}アベラルドは絶望して両手を上げた。{/n}「もしかしたら、エデルスラドとその護衛はここにたどり着けなかったのかもしれません。もしそうだったとしたら、もっとひどいことになります！」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late! We are too late!{/d}" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

traits.locale_text: 「手遅れだった！私たちは遅すぎた！」 {n}アベラルドは絶望して両手を上げた。{/n} 「もしかしたら、エデルスラドとその護衛はここにたどり着けなかったのかもしれない。もしそうだったとしたら、もっと悪いことになる！」
「{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}手遅れだった！遅すぎた！{/d}」{n}アベラルドは絶望して両手を上げた。{/n}「もしかしたら、エデルスラドとその護衛はここにたどり着けなかったのかもしれません。もしそうだったとしたら、もっとひどいことになります！」

languages.original_text: "Too late! We are too late!" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

languages.text: « {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Trop tard ! Il est trop tard !{/d} {n}s'exclame Abélard en levant les bras, désespéré.{/n} À moins qu'Edelthrad et son escorte n'aient pas réussi à arriver jusqu'ici... ce qui serait encore pire ! »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late! We are too late!{/d}" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

traits.locale_text: « Trop tard ! Il est trop tard ! {n}s'exclame Abélard en levant les bras, désespéré.{/n} À moins qu'Edelthrad et son escorte n'aient pas réussi à arriver jusqu'ici... ce qui serait encore pire ! »

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Zu spät! Wir kommen zu spät!{/d}" {n}Abelard reißt verzweifelt die Arme in die Höhe.{/n} "Oder Edelthrad und seine Eskorte haben es nie bis hierher geschafft – was noch schlimmer wäre!"
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late! We are too late!{/d}" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

traits.locale_text: "Zu spät! Wir kommen zu spät!" {n}Abelard reißt verzweifelt die Arme in die Höhe.{/n} "Oder Edelthrad und seine Eskorte haben es nie bis hierher geschafft – was noch schlimmer wäre!"

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Çok geç! Çok geç kaldık!{/d}" {n}Abelard, ellerini ümitsizlikle havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ya da belki Edelthrad ve maiyetindekiler buraya hiç ulaşmadı ki bu çok daha kötü!"
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late! We are too late!{/d}" {n}Abelard throws up his hands in despair.{/n} "Or perhaps Edelthrad and his escort never made it here — which would be even worse!"

traits.locale_text: "Çok geç! Çok geç kaldık!" {n}Abelard, ellerini ümitsizlikle havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Ya da belki Edelthrad ve maiyetindekiler buraya hiç ulaşmadı ki bu çok daha kötü!"
